titles.title: United States Federal Government Preservation Act of 1999
To provide that the provisions of Executive Order 13107, relating to the implementation of certain human rights treaties, shall not have any legal effect.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate
Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 2/10/1999--Introduced. United States Federal Government Preservation Act of 1999 - Nullifies Executive Order 13107 relating to the implementation of certain human rights treaties.
